[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IHeftLifecycleHooks](./heft.iheftlifecyclehooks.md) &gt; [taskFinish](./heft.iheftlifecyclehooks.taskfinish.md)

## IHeftLifecycleHooks.taskFinish property

The `taskFinish` hook is called at the end of a task. It is called after the task has completed execution. To use it, call `taskFinish.tap(<pluginName>, <callback>)`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
taskFinish: SyncHook<IHeftTaskFinishHookOptions>;
```
